92d732287d1affcc0a9286c3f2e4dd4c: RUN mvn -pl rdfunit-validate -am clean package -P cli-standalone -DskipTests=true
654f97ce551d77d1fcc365db1f831661: RUN apt-get install -qqy software-properties-common openjdk-8-jdk wget
d38da603bda819ae3ad0730285e3409d: RUN apk add --no-cache openssl nss-dev nss
6de42bca65dc10125940c8ea0b9913c9: RUN apk add --no-cache bash tini libc6-compat linux-pam krb5 krb5-libs
872b17c4025dbf4659c0bdae7c0c18d6: FROM maven:alpine # image based on smaller Alpine Linux
b63ece5ba9fd17c165a15c72be66c082: EXPOSE 80 # expose container ports (80 for the application)
4f8fc1826611e945f5bd7867f980e99f: RUN apt-get install -y `# common tools` git-core rsync sudo vim less curl gpg tar zip procps `# parsing utils xml json etc` libxml2 libxml2-utils jq `# usual build tools for eg nodejs modules` make automake autoconf libtool nasm gcc
cea13921fd8a835f9442faf61ca927f1: RUN apt-get install -y `# builders for linux installers` rpm dpkg pkg-config `# libraries for nodejs image processing` libpng-dev libjpeg-progs pngquant `# node; maven installs this usually, but handy to have for testing` nodejs
